item.title: Building material left on pavement, 15th October
item.description:

item.title: Oxfam container and other litter right next to Texico Station on Seven Sisters Road, 15th October
item.description:
This is a consistent. People open oxfam and electronic donation boxes, throwing all of the things all over the road. This happens almost every other day. The people also throw furniture, like a mini fridge next to it. This has been happenin for months.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wilberforce Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Response to your closure of damaged vehicle - Tuam Road, 15th October
item.description:
Your answer to this and other Abandoned / Damaged / Stolen vehicles is templated, and completely contradicts the information on your own website - linked here, for reference - https://www.royalgreenwich.gov.uk/parking-transport-and-streets/parking-fines-and-enforcement/report-abandoned-or-untaxed-vehicle and on gov.uk https://www.gov.uk/guidance/abandoned-vehicles-council-responsibilities#duty-to-remove-abandoned-vehicles
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tuam Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
